abstract: The subject of the Cardinals slugger's impending free agency has been on the minds of St. Louis fans and many of his teammates as well.
snippet: The subject of the Cardinals slugger's impending free agency has been on the minds of St. Louis fans and many of his teammates as well.
lead_paragraph: ST. LOUIS - When Albert Pujols came to bat in the seventh inning of Game 6 of the World Series on Thursday night, the St. Louis Cardinals were losing and on the brink of elimination, and Pujols had not had a hit since his three home runs in Game 3.

headline.main: Pujols Not Ready to Look Forward
